entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
